title: 5 ways to encrypt e-mail in Linux
description:
Type : PDF
Pages : 9

Email is still important for business, and it is necessary to keep it encrypted. Here are 5 ways you can encrypt your email on Linux!

Email, though an aging technology, is still as relevant as ever. For as much as people like to do most of their communication on social networks such asand Twitter, youâ€™ll be hard-pressed to find someone willing to do any sort of professional work outside of email
